text: My Seventeen ♡

author: @Deeya1319
text:
I hope everyone will read this! Cause it's important!😳😊
Seventeen didn't only saved us but also told us to cherish the little things.🩷it might be little for us but who knows how much courage others needed to show that little gesture🩷and how hard others are trying to get what's little for us!🩷Thank you seventeen for always telling us to Fight for our life.🩷 
Thank you for tell us that we are never alone in this journey and never too late or early!!🩷 Everyone faces trouble in their life, but through that road many of us are able to get out and unintentionally become others motivation!!!🩷 That "Motivation" is Seventeen, for us!🩷 Who told us to keep walking and always believe in yourself!🩷 We hope Seventeen and us also got a "Motivator".🩷 We love y'all so much.🩷 We have grown a lot in this journey!!🩷 No, you never told us to only pay attention to you but also told us to express gratitude to the people around us!🩷 We have said "Thank-you and We love you" many times but remember we said it genuinely!🩷 That Genuine!🩷 That we want you to be happy in the future and have a happy family.🩷 Play with your kids.🩷 Late night talk with your partner!🩷 I hope you enjoy everything in this life🩷
We are sorry but you knew. We wanted to see you cause we missed you so badly!🩷 We never knew how hard it could be! How dangerous stage performance, concerts and world tours are! 
Until you showed us "HIT THE ROAD!🩷 Yeah! It hit us so badly!🩷 But thank you for telling us what you were going through behind that smile!🩷 You didn't only spoke up for yourself but also became a voice to other artists!🩷 And now, through this letter, I became a voice for the fans!🩷 I am specking what they desperately wanted to say but never got the chance or the right words!🩷And baby it's okay to take some rest and breathe🩷
Thank you seventeen!🩷
Thank you for telling us to not just exist but live it fully!🩷
🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷🩷

author: @Deeya1319
text:
SEVENTEEN - 사랑쪽지 (Love Letter) (English Translation) Lyrics

[Verse 1: WOOZI, Joshua]
Starting early in the morning
I awkwardly, mmh
Take out a pen and a paper
And write down the words I had deeply swallowed
My handwriting isn't pretty, oh
Please, don't be disappointed
Please, let it go if I suck

[Pre-Chorus: DK]
On this letter, I want to write down our story
Every little thing about you and me

[Chorus: Performance & Vocal Unit, DK, WOOZI]
Write everything down about us on a love letter
(Throw it in the air)
(Ooh-oh) And throw it into the empty sky
(Baby, baby, baby) The wind will embrace us
(Oh, oh, oh, oh) So that your painful days of the past are erased
(Throw it in the air)
(Ooh-oh) I will hold you tightly and never let go
I will always be by your side

[Verse 2: S.COUPS, Wonwoo, DK]
(One, two, three)
Worrying all night about my bad handwriting
Which is about as bad as how I express my feelings
I try to sincerely express myself but I can't get it out
I try to wrap my head around this all night (Ooh-ooh-ooh, yeah)
But I can't deliver my feelings

[Verse 3: Mingyu, DK, Vernon]
I wonder if you know how much I'm worrying (Mameul alkka)
When do I give you the letter in my pocket? (Mameul alkka)
I approach you without thinking
And calm my breath
"Can you give me your hand?
Here, this is for you"

[Pre-Chorus: SeungKwan]
On this letter, I want to write down our story
Every little thing about you and me

[Chorus: Performance & Vocal Unit, DK, WOOZI]
Write everything down about us on a love letter
(Throw it in the air)
(Ooh-oh) And throw it into the empty sky
(Baby, baby, baby) The wind will embrace us
(Oh, oh, oh, oh) So that your painful days of the past are erased
(Throw it in the air)
(Ooh-oh) I will hold you tightly and never let go
I will always be by your side

[Bridge: Jeonghan, DK]
There are still so many things
I ended up not able to tell you
I open my arms
And swear to the sky
I won't leave you and run away

[Interlude: Wonwoo, Vernon]
Write everything down about us on a love letter
Mmh, and raise it in that sky
You know I can't get
Any better than this, babe

[Chorus: DK, Performance & Vocal Unit, WOOZI]
(Oh, oh, oh, yeah) So that your painful days of the past are erased, ooh-oh
(Ooh-oh)I will hold you tightly and never let go
(Hey) I will always be by your side
Write everything down about us on a love letter
(Throw it in the air)
Ooh-oh, and throw it into the empty sky
(Baby, baby, baby) The wind will embrace us
(Oh, oh, oh, oh) So that your painful days of the past are erased
(Throw it in the air)
Ooh-oh, I will hold you tightly and never let go
I will always be by your side

text:
요즘 스밍하다가 입덕하고 몇 번 못 본 사랑쪽지 뮤비를 집중해서 보게 되었어요..
보고 있으니 그 풋풋함에 그리운 마음이 들기도 하고 울컥해 눈물이 날 것 같네요.ㅎㅎㅎ
우리 세븐틴이 이렇게 열심히 노력하며 살아왔다는걸 이 뮤비를 보며 다시 한번 깨닫고 갑니다.
앞으로 하고싶은 것 맘껏하고 진심으로 행복함을 느꼈으면 좋겠어요.
너무 고생했고 사랑해!!

author: @chairoong2203
text:
Carats! Don't forget to v0te SEVENTEEN daily on: 
- IDOL CHAMP (apan group men & best rapper) - app 
- THEKKing (Shua's bday add) - app
- mubeat (gaon chart music awards. we can start collecting votes today!) - app 
- MAMA (they're nominated for 5 categories!) - mwave
- fan N star (Jun @individual & SVT @TMA Popularity Award) - app // site
- boy band billboard battle (they're in bracket no.9!) - site

We're doing really great so far but we need more help to push more! Fighting carats! Spread the word! 

Also, let me know if I missed any other v0tings. Happy str3aming! <3

author: @shin4839
text:
How to stream when you have a wifi?

1. Make a list of what we need to stream. 
2. Playlist on youtube, spotify.
3. Loop
4. Play it when you're free or cleaning, washing, reviewing, bored, focus on each member, memorize the song, the dance, the angle of their faces, how their hair moves, count the screen time of each member, appreciate the visual, vocal and the choreography. And last, make your final decision of which bias are you.
5. Repeat again.

STREAMING IS EASY WHEN YOU HAVE WIFI. PERIOD. PERIODISM. PERIODIC. PERIODICAL.

author: @gohjn11
text:
I officially fell in love with Seventeen a month ago. I've been listening to their songs for a year now since my friend showed me the mv of "Don't Wanna Cry". I am a VIP and I told myself that I will not stan other group for I feel like my love should be for one group only and that is BigBang. But girl, there were nights that I woke up at 3AM and just decided to watch their 2x performance of "Don't Wanna Cry" in Weekly Idol and still swoon like crazy! These guys are very talented! There's something about them that I can't resist no matter how many times I tried not to fall in love with them. 

And a few weeks from now, they will have their Ideal Cut concert in my country! I'm the happiest since I just became a fan and I am going to see them live soon!!! I am so excited I can't wait to see them! ♡

0:22 - 0:24 Mingyu being all adorable and stealing my heart

1:12 What the heck are they doing to poor Mingyu XD
1:19 - 1:22 Ah I love them so much
1:29 Mother questioning her son's dance skills
1:57 An example of pure beauty and talent
2:36 Look it's a god in only one of his beautiful states
2:37 I SAW THAT LITTLE SMIRK JOSHUA YOU CAN'T HIDE IT
2:48 When you're with the crew and the beat drops on your favourite song
3:01 -  3:10 The angels are returning to their homes

I am very bored, so I just wrote down a bucnh of great moments. There are many more but I don't have anything creative to say so Imma just leave it here.
Conclusion: I love Seventeen so much, they are all adorable/talented/idoits

~Sincerely a crying Canadian Carat because they can't go to the concert in Toronto

author: @jeonboi1009
text:
I didn't realise they've released so many mvs for non title tracks! I came onto YouTube to watch their highlight dance practice for like the third time but then I saw check in and Healing and Love Letter mvs...my baby MINGYU is always so adorable.
On another topic, I've officially become a svt stan as of 1 Feb 2017. But it's a bit vague as I was familiar with them since Nov 2015 (when I watched their adore u and mansae mvs and fronting stage at the showcase and listened to carat and boys be album, and a while after that watched their show champ goodbye stage - the one with omg) and and then again like two months ago when I started listening to all their songs on Spotify and again a little over a week ago, I listened to their going seventeen album and a few days ago I watched star show 360 and one fine day)... and then their English fail compilations.. Idk when to say when I got into the fandom.. well i don't consider I'm in the fandom yet cos i haven't interacted with other carats.. hmm.. I'm really sorry for my incoherent writing but I just needed to remember how I came to stan seventeen...

author: @seseselah
text: This is how young boys should be. Happy, and carefree. Too many young men try to act all cool, and act like they have it all together these days. They don't live, they don't love life like they should. They're so caught up worrying that they won't be seen as "cool" and "manly" that they can't have a good times, and enjoy life. But that's not how anyone should live. We should all be out there, living life to the fullest, and enjoying every moment. Keep it up SEVENTEEN.

author: @mlo5046
text:
Guys, I have a confession to make.
I am in love with Seventeen's music. I mean yeah, I love the members, but their songs are a whole different topic.
Before discovering Seventeen, I've always thought that songs that would touch me on a pretty deep, emotional level only came once in a while. That's why I treasure those songs. An example would be BTS' 'For You' (which is in Japanese). 

One day for no specific reason, I decided to marathon on Seventeen. I've been familiar of them since last year, but have not really gotten that into the group. 

GUYS, their album, 'love and letter' was legit the first Kpop album to ever have me love every song on the tracklist. Seriously. It's the first album that makes me want to sit and down and play the entire thing on repeat without having to think of the occasion. Just omg. 

I'm writing this here because I'm in the hopes of getting my message sent out to both Seventeen and Pledis. I just wanna say that you guys are doing an awesome job. It's hard not to get intimidated by other groups and be tempted to change your style just to be at par with them. But seriously, Seventeen is Seventeen, and this group is making a name for itself just by making such awesome music and choreographies. Keep doing you, guys! The boys at Seventeen never fail to make my day :)

- The group picture on the beach!
- But Wonwoo's solo though.

text:
To those who are new to the Carat fandom:
Their are 13 boys, 3 sub-units (Vocal, Hip Hop and Performance team), + 1 whole group =17 hence their name. Here is their name and age all in order, you're all welcome!
 Leader S.coups (Choi Seungcheol) 95 liner
Yoon Jeonghan 95 liner
Hong Joshua (Korean name: Jisoo Hong) 95 liner
Jun (Wen Junhui) 96 liner, china line
Hoshi (Kwon Soonyoung) , 96 Liner
Wonwoo (Jeon Wonwoo),  96 Liner
Woozi (Lee Jihoon) , 96 Liner
DK (Lee Seokmin) , 97 Liner
Mingyu (Kim Mingyu),  97 Liner
The8 (Xu Minghao) , 97 Liner, china line
Seungkwan (Boo Seungkwan),  98 Liner
Vernon Chwe (Korean: Choi Hansol), 98 Liner
 Maknae Dino (Lee Chan), 99 Liner

author: @AoKuro31
text: I am so glad I found this group! These boys are just precious and have so much talent. I don't love this group, because of their looks or talent, but because of who they are on the inside. They have so much passion and always put 100% into whatever they do. I can't help but smile every time I see a video of them. They are so underrated at this point, but I just know that in the future, they will be the next big thing. Even though we are your carats, you are ours too. You shine like one and are priceless. Always remember that your health is more important than anything else. Just thank you for sharing your lives with us. I know it can be hard at times, but we are always here to catch you!

author: @Broccolaicy
text:
translation for the letter on the thumbnail and 3:10 (the one which number 17 was drawn on):

To carat,

Are you doing okay? I'm (we're) busy now to prepare for the comeback.
The thought of wanting to show you other songs in this last album and for the next 2nd album is very exciting.
The whole day we have a big desire to have a comeback quickly so we can show our new songs and stages to carats.
Thank you for supporting us until now, and let's always be together in the future!
Thank you and love you, always.

[translation not mine. got it from NastyMingyuEmoWonwooLove's google+]
